nisa­wen numbaa nowak wiya yuthu numbaata ma ya mata nowasuni­lsiri pranandu  paw beya­daka athi atha digu kala no haki bama­run nithi sarana miyaki madhu no raki beya­dehi pathla randemin kawi liwiya haki piya­mbaanu nohaki wimi mawe­thin wiyaki wanaya pura mal pipena nimak nathi sula­ngin sora gath muwa­rada kerethi ruthi derana wathiri para­mal pethi hada dawathi samuwa kalama mal nela­min nithi budithisunil liwa­nage  likola palasse ala­bada gamma ne puru­duyi-huruyi dutuda inda­lama na ne pa netha aya penwu mudu sumudu gu ne ma netha piyena thuru ama­thaka nowenu da ne sassanda gale sanda pane yana kala ta thissema dane mandu malwala suwanda ma ta gassena hada­wathe me kawi liyana wi ta thissema sihi­wuna nana­ndiya ma ta gongutu-himbautu-kotha­langa hama wa ra ranwa­raka dileyi athu aga palu wi ra benduru gale pala mane gan iwu ra paluyi adath oba nathi wana petha sondu ralaggala as.
